data.description: [Hama] With this Scout you can get some interesting rolls, I'd prefer Arrowhead and Fluted here and I'd pair that with either Armor Piercing for Shields and Barriers or Flared Magwell. Shoot to Loot is a very fun perk that can be very well utilized if you're of mind to do so. If not then I'd normally go for Stats For All or Triple Tap as better, with SFA being my go to option. Multikill Clip would be my go to damage perk, but Vorpal would be nice to help take down Barriers and Adagio can also be good. Recommended MW: Reload.

data.description: [Hama] Amazing weapon to use against Barrier Champions, out classes every other weapon in this regard. It also shines in PvP due to being a Special LFR with very high Aim Assist values.
data.name: Arbalest

data.description: [Hama] For Arc Logic I think you're either opting into Adren Junkie for damage, while Demo is for Nade builds. You'd want to pair Adren Junkie or Demo with Feeding Frenzy, Subsistence or Overflow. Frenzy is an option if with Subsistence or Overflow. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and Accurized / Flared for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Arc Logic

data.description: [Hama] For Arc Logic I think you're either opting into Adren Junkie for damage, while Demo is for Nade builds. You'd want to pair Adren Junkie or Demo with Feeding Frenzy, Subsistence or Overflow. Frenzy is an option if with Subsistence / Overflow. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and Accurized / Flared for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Arc Logic

data.description: [Hama] Arrowhead Brake is my go to roll for most Auto Rifles, but Hammerforged / Fluted are also good Barrels. Accurized would be my go to as you're already getting a good amount of Reload from Outlaw or Ammo back from Subsistence, but Flared is also an option. While it lacks versatile rolls it can still get Subsistence or Outlaw paired with Vorpal. Recommended MW: Range.

data.description: [Hama] Void Slug Shotgun from Europa. While this isn't really a weapon I'd farm for, it is still a Slug that can roll Auto-Loading. Though lacking a real damage perk does mean it's not that great. Arrowhead / Fluted is your go to Barrels and Assault Mag is a marginal DPS increase, but if you don't have it it's not that big of a deal. You'll want Auto-Loading in your 3rd column and then Demo in your 4th column. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Bonechiller

data.description: [Hama] Pretty solid SMG, but hard to get a good roll on. With Feeding Frenzy the main damage perks you're looking for is One For All for general use and Adren Junkie for Nade builds. You can also opt into Demo for Nade builds. Hammerforged / Smallbore are the Barrels I'd go for here and High-Cal / Ricochet for Mags. Overflow also works very well here, but I prefer Feeding Frenzy in this scenario overall. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Borrowed Time

data.description: [Hama] Frenzy enables Full Bore / Extended Barrel on this gun for extra Range. I'd optimally pair Frenzy with Overflow, but Feeding Frenzy/Surplus isn't bad either. Preferred Barrels would be Hammerforged / Full Bore / Extended and for Mags I'd say High-Cal / Ricochet / Light Mag. Recommended MW: Range.

data.name: Borrowed Time

data.name: Bottom Dollar

data.description: [Hama] I'm not too keen on Sidearms, but this one can roll One For All and Frenzy for dmg options which makes it interesting. I'd recommend pairing those with either Rapid Hit or Overflow. Recommended Barrels I'd say Fluted / Corkscrew and High-Cal / Ricochet for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Brass Attacks

data.description: [Hama] Demo + Adren Junkie is probably the best combination for this gun if you're running Nade builds. I really want Blunt Execution Rounds to be good, but they're just not. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels here along with Accurized / Ricochet for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: BxR-55 Battler

data.description: [Hama] For general usage Kill Clip is what you'd want here and ideally you'd pair it with Perpetual Motion, but Outlaw is also fine. Demo can work, but mostly you'd want that with Adren Junkie for Nade builds. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and Accurized / Ricochet for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: BxR-55 Battler

data.description: [Hama] Heavy GL's are not in a good spot right now, but this one still has some rolls that you can mess around with. Hard Launch is my go to barrel, with Quick Launch being my 2nd choice. Clown Cartridge or Field Prep is what you want here and you'd pair with Chain Reaction, Vorpal or Kill Clip for damage. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload.
data.name: Canis Major

data.description: [Hama] While not amazing, it's can still have some okay PvE rolls. Rapid Hit is the best option in the 3rd column and for dmg perks you'd want Vorpal or Timed Payload. Hammerforged / Smallbore are the Barrels I'd recommend and Accurized / Flared for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Cantata-57

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Cantata-57

data.description: [Hama] A solid Rapid Fire Fusion. Red Dot Micro is your 1st choice of Sight and Red Dot 2 MOA is your 2nd best option. Liquid / Accelerated Coils is mostly preference, but in this case I prefer Liquid. Feeding Frenzy and Vorpal are your best 3rd and 4th column perks, though you can opt into Swashbuckler. Recommended MW: Stability or Range.
data.name: Cartesian Coordinate

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Cartesian Coordinate

data.description: [Hama] A craftable Raid LFR that I would highly recommend getting. Arrowhead Brake is my recommendation here, but Fluted Barrel is also a good option. Enhanced Battery makes you hit 6 in the mag which is what you want when using Fourth Times the Charm, you do not want 7 in the mag as it increases the amount of shots needed to proc Focused Fury from 3 to 4. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload Speed.
data.name: Cataclysmic

data.description: [Hama] I really enjoy this Kinetic 720 rpm Auto as it feels very good to use. Feeding Frenzy is IMO the best 3rd column perk and you pair this with Kill Clip / Rampage for normal usage or Adren Junkie if speccing into Nade builds. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and you'd want Accurized for Mag, but Appended is also fine. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Chroma Rush

data.description: [Hama] A good feeling auto, if you prefer using Heating Up / Subsistence you can pair this with Kill Clip / Rampage for normal usage or Adren Junkie if speccing into Nade builds. Arrowhead / Fluted would be my go to Barrels, but for Mags I'd recommend Flared / Tactical since you're not getting reload speed from your 3rd column. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Chroma Rush

data.description: [Hama] Fluted Barrel feels very necessary here to help the gun feel better, but Smallbore / Corkscrew also works. Flared / Tac Mag helps push the Reload faster, but Accurized if Frenzy. Dynamic Sway Reduction makes this gun feel a lot better to use and is my preferred roll for 3rd column. Outlaw also works though. Frenzy and Multikill Clip are your damage options, my preference being Frenzy. Demo is also okay for Nade builds. Recommended MW: Range or Reload.

data.description: [Hama] A Pulse Rifle that is sadly outmatched by other options in PvE. Arrowhead and Fluted are your go to options for Barrel and High Cal / Ricochet Rounds are your go to Mags. Feeding Frenzy and Multikill Clip are basically your only 3rd and 4th column options here. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Cold Denial

data.description: [Hama] An alright SMG overall, my preferred dmg perk is One For All, but Kill Clip / Swash can also work. I'd recommend pairing this with Perpetual Motion, but Feeding Frenzy, Subsistence and Surplus are also good choices. Hammerforged / Smallbore would be my recommended Barrels and Accurized for Mag, but Flared is also fine. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Cold Front

data.description: [Hama] Stats For All and One For All combo is super potent. Fluted is your preferred Barrel here, but Arrowhead is also fine. You'll want to opt into Accurized for Mag, but Flared is also good. Stats for All is your best option in 3rd column, but some like Perpetual Motion or Shoot to Loot. Other than One For All you can opt into Golden Tricorn if you're running an Arc subclass. Recommended MW: Stability or Handling.
data.name: Come To Pass

data.description: [Hama] While not amazing on rolls Reconstruction doubles your Mag and enables a lot of shooting. Rampage and Dragonfly are your only real options in the 4th column and for Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and Flared / Tactical for Mags. Recommended MW: Handling.

data.description: [Hama] Really good Scout Rifle. The options of One For All, Kill Clip and Frenzy makes this a very potent 260 Scout Rifle and you can pair them with Surplus, Outlaw or Subsistence depending on your preference. For Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and Flared / Tactical for Mags. Recommended MW: Handling.

data.name: Contingency Plan

data.description: [Hama] The only Aggressive Fusion Rifle we have right now and Coriolis Force is very solid for DPS situations. Arrowhead Brake or Fluted is my go to Barrels, with Enhanced Battery or Liquid Coils. Under Pressure and Pulse Monitor are both very good for DPS situations and Rangefinder gives extra Range. data.description: [Hama] Ever since they nerfed Whirlwind Blade, Vorpal is now the preferred option here. You'll want Jagged Edge and Relentless Strikes to pair with it though.
data.name: Crown-Splitter

data.description: [Hama] While mostly considered a PvP gun, this Pulse does have a couple PvE rolls. Arrowhead and Fluted are your usual go to barrels for Pulse Rifles and you'd want High Cal or Armor Piercing rounds for your Mag. The decision between Subsistence, Surplus and Overflow is largely preference, but I'd lean towards Surplus > Overflow > Subsistence. I like One For All on Rapid Fire Pulses, but Rampage is fine as well. Recommended MW: Reload.
data.name: Darkest Before

data.description: [Hama] Vorpal works very well on this gun in general as it's the only damage perk it can roll. Smallbore / Corkscrew are my recommended Barrels and High-Cal / Flared for Mags. The Stocks are mostly versatile depending on preference, but I'd go for Short-Action / Hand-Laid.
data.name: Dead Man's Tale

data.description: [Hama] Fourth Times, Outlaw, Subsistence are all solid general use options for this gun, though I'm of the opinion that Vorpal is generally better. For Barrels I'd prefer Smallbore / Corkscrew and High-Cal / Ricochet for Mags. Stocks are kinda versatile depending on preference, but I'd recommend using Short-Action / Hand-Laid.
data.name: Dead Man's Tale

data.description: [Hama] Very good gun for general ad clear and the fact you can change elements makes it very versatile. Very fun to use if your exotic slot isn't already taken up.
data.name: Dead Messenger

data.description: [Hama] A Wave Frame with pretty lackluster rolls, but still works. Quick Launch / Smart Drift is preferred and as usual you opt into High Velocity Rounds. Ambitious Assassin is very good on Special GL's, but unfortunately there's no good perks to pair it with so you're opting into Rampage or Auto-Loading. Recommended MW: Velocity or Reload.
data.name: Deafening Whisper

data.description: [Hama] Does respectable DPS and can also be used for ad clear from a safe distance and in a way traditional Rocket Launcher's can't. Very fun to use.
data.name: Deathbringer

data.description: [Hama] How I see it is that most of this Deliverance's potential lies behind Chill Clip and Stasis builds. This is further enabled by it having solid 3rd column perks such as Perpetual Motion / Demo to choose between. For Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and Enhanced Mag / Liquid Coils for Batteries. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Deliverance

data.description: [Hama] Deliverance can also roll the very potent Demo + Adren Junkie combo if you're a fan of Nade builds. Recommended Barrels I'd say Arrowhead / Fluted and for Batteries I'd say Enhanced / Liquid Coils. Recommended MW: Handling.

data.description: [Hama] For many boss encounters this is basically the best gun to use that very few actually wants to use. Of course having more than 1 is detrimental, but just having 1 is a big boost to your teams overall damage over a DPS phase.

data.name: Duality

data.description: [Hama] Stats For All + One For All is a very good combination for this gun and is what I'd go for as it has very good synergy. Perpetual Motion and Vorpal is also nice, but I personally think it's wasted potential on this gun compared to this roll. For Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Hammerforged and for Mags I'd go for Accurized / Flared. Recommended MW: Range.

data.description: [Hama] One For All / Vorpal / Rampage are solid dmg options here and pairs well with Perpetual Motion. Personally I'd like Stats For All + One For All, but this also works fine. Arrowhead / Hammerforged would be my recommended Barrels along with Accurized / Flared for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.

data.description: [Hama] With Spike Grenades you want to have as low Blast Radius as possible as it negatively affects your damage. Hard Launch is therefore your best option, but the other barrels that doesn't increase your Blast Radius are also fine. Quick Launch is my 2nd pick here. Ambitious Assassin feels very good on Special GL's and Empty Vessel is no exception. Feeding Frenzy is nice if you're intending to chain kills. Vorpal and Multikill Clip are both good damage options, Vorpal is a good source of passive bonus damage on Majors and Bosses while Multikill Clip rewards chaining kills has a higher damage buff, but requires to be procced. Recommended MW: Velocity or Reload Speed.
data.name: Empty Vessel

data.description: [Hama] Did you know that Danger Zone increases the range of Blinding Grenades by 3 meters when procced? Very good roll, use Quick Launch if you have it combined with Auto-Loading. If you don't end up liking Danger Zone feel free to opt for something else. Recommended MW: Velocity
data.name: Empty Vessel

data.description: [Hama] With Spike Grenades you want to have as low Blast Radius as possible as it negatively affects your damage. Hard Launch is therefore your best option, but the other barrels that doesn't increase your Blast Radius are also fine. Quick Launch is my 2nd pick here. Auto-Loading is a perk that rewards swapping weapons so is best utilized with a passive damage perk like Vorpal or if you're speccing into a grenade build it can also supplement Demolitionist. Recommended MW: Velocity.
data.name: Empty Vessel

data.description: [Hama] When using Blinding Grenades your barrel does not really matter that much, but I would avoid barrels that are a detriment to your weapons stats. Quick Launch would be my go to though as Velocity and Handling is very nice for when you're utilizing Blinding Grenades. While Auto-Loading would be my go to, Field Prep isn't a bad option either. Though it requires you to manually reload which makes it less desirable in my opinion. Vorpal is not a bad option if you want some extra damage on your Blinding Grenades, though this isn't what you're ideally using them for so having Demolitionist where you can have another shot on demand in case of emergency is nice and Disruption Break can be neat for higher end content where there's Match Game and Solar Shields. Recommended MW: Velocity
data.name: Empty Vessel

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Empty Vessel

data.description: [Hama] Pretty lackluster SMG, but it has some okay rolls. Model 8 Red is the preferred Sight, but Model 6 Loop is an okay 2nd choice. Accurized or Flared are your best mag choices and will depend on your preferences. Overflow feels good on these SMG's, but Threat Detector is also fine. Vorpal is your only good damage option. Recommended MW: Range or Reload.
data.name: Escape Velocity

data.description: [Hama] Rapid Hit is an amazing perk on Scouts and you can easily combine this with One For All. Kill Clip is a fine second option for damage and you can opt into Disruption Break for Match Game content if you have a specific plan for it. Personally I think the ideal Scope is Flash HS5 / Candle PS, but this ends up being heavily preference in the end. High Cal / Flared are my preferred Mags, but Armor Piercing is solid for Match Game content or Barrier Champs. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Eternal Blazon

data.description: [Hama] Rapid Hit is an amazing perk on Scouts and you can easily combine this with One For All. data.description: [Hama] Solid wave frame that can roll either One For All as a general use damage option or Golden Tricorn if you're invested into the Solar subclass. Disruption Break also has a place here, but it's kinda niche. Stats For All maxes out Handling and Reload so that's a good option, but Auto-Loading is also solid. Quick / Smart Drift are the Barrels I'd recommend along with High Velocity. Recommended MW: Velocity.

data.name: Explosive Personality

data.description: [Hama] Overflow and Frenzy feels really smooth on this gun and is my favorite roll here. Pushing the Range of this gun is what I'd want as you already get a ton of Handling an Reload from Frenzy. For Barrels I'd recommend Hammerforged / Smallbore and for Mags I'd say Accurized, but Flared is also fine. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Extraordinary Rendition

data.description: [Hama] One For All and Overflow is a solid combination on this gun, but without Frenzy I'd prefer Flared / Tactical for Mags rather than Accurized. Hammerforged / Smallbore are still my preferred Barrels though. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Extraordinary Rendition

data.description: [Hama] Very solid SMG overall, Multikill Clip, One For All and Frenzy are all good dmg options for this gun and you can pair them all with Subsistence / Surplus. My personal preference is Frenzy or OFA with Overflow though. For Barrels I'd say Hammerforged / Smallbore and for Mags Accurized / Flared. Recommended MW: Range.

data.description: [Hama] You have a variety of options for this Hand Cannon. Truesight will be your go to Sight, but Fastdraw / Steady Hand are also solid. High Cal is preferred, but opting into Light Mag or anything that gives Range or Reload. Choice between Outlaw, Rapid Hit and Perp Motion on a Hand Cannon depends on preferences. Perp Motion > Rapid Hit > Outlaw for me. Kill Clip for damage, Headstone for Stasis builds and Demo for Nade builds. Recommended MW: Range.

data.description: [Hama] Along with Razor's Edge the best legendary Sword for DPS right now. Generally you want Jagged Edge for the extra Impact, with Honed Edge being the 2nd choice if Jagged isn't available. While Swordmaster's is the best one, as long as it's not Heavy Guard you're generally fine. For DPS you'll want Relentless Strikes, but Tireless works for just killing normal ads. Whirlwind Blade is your go to for sustained DPS, but Vorpal is better for immediate burst DPS. Recommended MW: Impact.

Firefly is very nice with this gun and is very satisfying to use, though you can also opt into Kill Clip or Frenzy for other damage options. Adren Junkie is solid if you're speccing into nade builds. data.description: [Hama] Chain Reaction on a Wave Frame oh boi. Quick Launch is solid while Linear / Smart Drift are also good options. High Velocity is your go to on Wave Frames. Ambitious Assassin stands as an amazing Special GL perk, but Stats For All also works.. Recommended MW: Handling, Reload or Velocity.
data.name: Forbearance

data.description: [Hama] The Raid wave frame has some solid rolls overall. Quick Launch is solid while Linear Comp are also good a option. High Velo Rounds is good. Ambitious Assassin would be my recommendation, but Stats For All is also solid. Golden Tricorn would solely be if you're running an Arc Subclass, otherwise you want One For All or Chain Reaction. Personally I'd prefer Chain Reaction. Recommended MW: Handling, Reload Speed or Velocity.
data.name: Forbearance

data.description: [Hama] The craftable Throne World SMG. Not too big of a fan of this one as it offers very few choices. Fluted Barrel is your go to here, but Corkscrew / Hammerforged are good 2nd options. Light Mag is your go to for Mag, but Flared is also a good option. Perp Motion is pretty much your only option in the 3rd column, unless you're a fan of Encore. You have the option between Kill Clip and Swashbuckler for damage perk or you can opt into Headstone for Stasis builds. Recommended MW: Range or Reload Speed.
data.name: Forensic Nightmare

data.description: [Hama] Not usually my go to Pulse, but with Stats for All and One For All combination this suddenly got potential. Arrowhead / Fluted is preferred Barrels and you'll either want Flared Magwell or Accurized for Mag. While this used to be a somewhat lackluster gun for PvE, with the addition of Stats for All it became a lot better. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Forge's Pledge

data.description: [Hama] Fortissimo is a pretty solid slug Shotgun, I'd personally like to run Perpetual Motion or Subsistence on it and pair it with damage options such as Vorpal or Frenzy. Demo + Adren Junkie is also a solid option for Nade builds. I also think Adagio has a place here, but some people may not like it. Arrowhead / Fluted are my preferred Barrels along with Assault / Appended for Mags. Recommended MW: Range / Handling.
data.name: Fortissimo-11

data.description: [Hama] Demo + Adren Junkie is a very potent perk combinations for Nade builds. Personally I don't spec into them too often, but this just ends up being a personal preference thing. For Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and for Mags, Assault / Appended. Recommended MW: Range / Handling.
data.name: Fortissimo-11

data.description: [Hama] Strong Slug shotgun for PvP as it can have some pretty solid rolls. Fluted / Hammerforged are your preferred Barrels and you'd want either Accurized or Assault Mag. Personally I'd go for Perpetual Motion here, but Surplus is also good. Opening Shot and Adagio are by far your best options in the 4th column. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Fortissimo-11

data.description: [Hama] Found Verdict has some solid PvE options, but primarily you'll want Auto-Loading to go with it. Full Choke / Barrel Shroud are your go to Barrels and while Assault Mag is best, Appended is also fine for Mags. Vorpal and Frenzy are both good damage options, but you can also opt into Demo for Nade builds or One-Two Punch if you're doing shenanigans around that. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Found Verdict

data.description: [Hama] Special Mention: Amazing PvP roll.

Vorpal and Frenzy are both good damage options, but you can also opt into Demo for nade builds or One-Two Punch if you're doing shenanigans around that. Recommended MW: Handling.

data.name: Fractethyst

data.description: [Hama] Solid Void Sniper from the Crucible. Arrowhead is as always a solid option on Sniper Rifles, while Fluted is a solid 2nd option. Appended allows you to reach 5 in the Mag with Backup Mag Mod which is the ideal if you're utilizing Triple Tap for max benefit. Extended also does this, but at the cost of Reload so it is sub optimal. Tac Mag allows you to hit 4 in the mag which is fine for normal usage. Triple Tap is your best option for DPS scenarios if you have 5 in the mag, for normal usage: Clown / Auto-Loading + Vorpal is a reliable damage option. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload.
data.name: Frozen Orbit

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Frozen Orbit

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Fugue-55

data.description: [Hama] I might have a bit of a controversial pick here as I'd really want Full Bore on this roll as I'd like to try and push out as much Range as possible along with Accurized due to having an abundance of stats from Perpetual Motion and Frenzy. This makes this my go to roll by far and if you're not buying stocks into Full Bore you can very well opt into Hammerforged / Smallbore. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Funnelweb

data.description: [Hama] Very good roll for this SMG for Nade junkies out there. I'd want to try and push the Range with Hammerforged / Full Bore along with Accurized as you're getting a decent amount of Reload from Perpetual Motion. Since you've specced into a Nade build you can really make this roll shine by having high uptime on Adren Junkie. If this isn't your playstyle you'd want Frenzy instead. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Funnelweb

data.description: [Hama] Big fan of this gun. Hammerforged / Full Bore is nice to try and get some extra Range and you can choose to pair this with Accurized, unless you want the Reload from Flared. Subsistence means that you'll get a lot of ammo returns in more casual content so you can choose to pair this with either Frenzy or Adren Junkie as your damage perks. If you're not going to consistently use grenades then Frenzy is for you. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Funnelweb

data.description: [Hama] Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Funnelweb

data.description: [Hama] Solid all around Rocket Launcher that can be used very effectively in all types of content.
data.name: Gjallarhorn

data.description: [Hama] While most High Impact Fusions kinda feel bad, Glacioclasm has the unique perk rolls of Subsistence / Slideshot to pair with Reservoir Burst. My recommended Barrels are Arrowhead / Fluted and Accelerated Coils / Particle Repeater for Batteries. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Glacioclasm

data.description: [Hama] I'm convinced Arrowhead is amazing on most Auto Rifles, but Fluted would be my 2nd choice. Accurized and Flared are both solid options for mags, it just comes down to if you want to push your Range slightly further or if you want slightly faster Reload. Subsistence is generally the sought after perk in the 3rd column. Multikill Clip and Demolitionist are solid options for your 4th column perks, but Kill Clip, Rampage and Swash aren't bad either. Recommended MW: Range
data.name: Gnawing Hunger

data.description: [Hama] While not having the best combination of rolls, this is a Pulse that I personally really like. Heating Up paired with Frenzy feels very good. Arrowhead / Fluted are your preferred Barrels and you'll want High-Cal / Armor Piercing / Light Mag for your Mag. Armor Piercing helps for Match Game content, while the others are more general use. Heating Up is your best 3rd column perk, while you can opt for either Multikill Clip, Adren Junkie or Frenzy for your damage perk. My preference is Frenzy. Recommended MW: Range or Reload.
data.name: Gridskipper

data.description: [Hama] You're mainly just using this for Eager Edge.
data.name: Half-Truths

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Hard Light

data.description: [Hama] Hawkmoon is a stat monster of a Hand Cannon, but is very limited on rolls. I'd recommend Smallbore / Corkscrew for Barrel and Smooth / Polymer for Grips. In PvE you'll mostly want Surplus, but Rangefinder is also fine.
data.name: Hawkmoon

data.description: [Hama] This Rocket doesn't have much going for it, but is easily farmable early in the game. Quick Launch / Smart Drift are your go to barrels and ideally you'd want Alloy Casing, but Impact Casing also works. Field Prep and Impulse Amplifier are your best options, but Ambitious Assassin can also work. Lasting Impression is your go to option for damage. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Heretic

data.description: [Hama] Very strong DPS and normal usage Shotgun. Arrowhead Brake / Fluted are your go to barrels and while Assault Mag is a marginal damage increase, it's not necessary. Reconstruction is very strong and Recombination will make your initial shot hit for a lot if you get the stacks going. Recommended MW: Handling or Range.
data.name: Heritage

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Heritage

data.description: [Hama] For a 360 Auto, Herod feels surprisingly good to use. For dmg perks you'd mostly want to opt into One For All, but Frenzy can work too. You'd want to pair these with Stats For All (my preference) or Perpetual Motion. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and High-Cal / Light Mag for Mags. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Herod-C

data.description: [Hama] Your go to DPS option. While we may have better options for DPS such as Hothead and Palmyra now, Hezen still does respectful damage as it can roll Lasting Impression. Vorpal is less desired after the nerf. Quick Launch / Smart Drift is your go to Barrels and you'd want Impact Casing with Auto-Loading, though Black Powder is also fine. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Hezen Vengeance

data.description: [Hama] Overflow feels very nice in normal content. Having 2 in your mag is really nice on a Rocket Launcher as it allows you to guarantee kills on larger enemies. Quick Launch / Linear are my go to Barrels here along with Alloy Casing, but Impact Casing also works. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Hezen Vengeance

data.description: [Hama] Your go to DPS option. While we may have better options for DPS such as Hothead and Palmyra now, Hezen still does respectful damage as it can roll Lasting Impression. Vorpal is less desired after the nerf. Quick Launch / Smart Drift is your go to Barrels and you'd want Impact Casing with Auto-Loading, though Black Powder is also fine. Recommended MW: Handling.

data.description: [Hama] Overflow feels very nice in normal content. Having 2 in your mag is really nice on a Rocket Launcher as it allows you to guarantee kills on larger enemies. Quick Launch / Linear are my go to Barrels here along with Alloy Casing, but Impact Casing also works. Recommended MW: Handling.

data.description: [Hama] A weapon from Arrivals that is now only available from Dares and isn't really worthwhile unless you have the specific roll of Feeding Frenzy and Vorpal. Fluted / Arrowhead are solid Barrels and Liquid Coils or Enhanced Battery for 2nd column. I would recommend just farming for a Plug One over this though as it is way easier to get a solid roll on it and is way easier to obtain. Recommended MW: Stability.
data.name: Hollow Words

data.description: [Hama] Being able to roll Rapid Hit is always a big + for Scouts. Hung Jury has solid dmg options available such as Explosive Payload, Firefly, One For All and Adren Junkie. Personally I prefer Explosive. Preferred Barrels would be Arrowhead / Fluted and for Mags I'd go for Flared / Tactical. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Hung Jury SR4

data.description: [Hama] Being able to roll Rapid Hit is always a big + for Scouts. Hung Jury has solid dmg options available such as Explosive Payload, Firefly, One For All and Adren Junkie. Personally I prefer Explosive. Preferred Barrels would be Arrowhead / Fluted and for Mags I'd go for Flared / Tactical. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Hung Jury SR4 (Adept)

data.description: [Hama] A solid aggressive SMG with relatively high base Handling, I would prefer Hammerforged here for extra Range or Smallbore as a solid 2nd option. Seraph Rounds provides bonus zoom making it the best option in terms of Mag, Accurized or Flared being alternatives. Subsistence, Threat Detector, or Pulse Monitor are all solid choices. Vorpal is the go to damage perk, while Demo is there for Nade builds. Disruption Break also exists for busting Arc Shields then swapping weapons. Recommended MW: Range or Reload Speed.
data.name: IKELOS_SMG_v1.0.2

data.description: [Hama] Good DPS Sniper for it's time, now mostly replaced by Father's Sins. Arrowhead and Fluted are solid options and you'd want Tactical Mag to get the Mag size up to 7. Appended and Extended also works, but at lower benefit. Triple Tap and High Impact Reserves are your go to for DPS with Fourth Times the Charm also being okay. Recommended MW: Handling or Range.
data.name: IKELOS_SR_v1.0.2

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Igneous Hammer

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Igneous Hammer (Adept)

data.description: [Hama] I spent so much time grinding this gun... Ignition Code can roll both Ambitious Assassin and Slideshot which are both very fun perks to mess around with. Hard Launch is my go to Barrel with Spikes, but Quick Launch is also solid. Slideshot enables you to reload by simply doing that, sliding, but Ambitious Assassin is the more conventional use choice. Vorpal for damage and Demo for Nade builds. Recommended MW: Velocity.
data.name: Ignition Code

data.description: [Hama] Ignition Code also have some flexible choice when it comes to Blinding Grenades as you can opt into either Slideshot for a fast reload or Quickdraw to always have it ready. Quick Launch / Smart Drift is my go to Barrels and Danger Zone increases the Blinding Nade radius by 3m when procced, but if you're not a fan of Danger Zone you can always opt into Vorpal or Demo. Recommended MW: Velocity.
data.name: Ignition Code

data.description: [Hama] Stats For All and One For All is an amazing combo on guns it works well with. This is definitely one of them and is one of my recommended options for this gun. Arrowhead is your preferred Barrel, but Fluted is a solid 2nd option. For Mag you'd want Accurized, but Flared is also fine. I think this is the best all around roll for this weapon. Demo + Adren Junkie is another option if you're speccing into Nade builds. Recommended MW: Handling or Range.
data.name: Insidious

data.description: [Hama] Demo + Adren Junkie is a super potent combo when you're speccing into nade builds. Arrowhead and Fluted are preferred Barrels and the options of Accurized and Flared is mostly preference for Mag. I would heavily recommend this perk combination if you're a grenade enthusiast. Stats for All + One For All is a better option if not. Recommended MW: Handling or Range.
data.name: Insidious

data.description: [Hama] A bit of a more unique perk combination. Dragonfly will help you proc One For All while also giving you AoE damage. Arrowhead / Fluted are preferred Barrels and Flared or Tact Mag for Mag. While this is more delicate combination, it's still very potent. Though I'd recommend Stats For All + One For All or Demo+Junkie if you want more all around or nade specced options. Recommended MW: Reload or Handling.
data.name: Insidious

data.description: [Hama] Pairing this with an Auto-Loading Rocket Launcher makes this thing a menace for DPS and is a piece of the highest DPS methods in the game.
data.name: Izanagi's Burden

data.description: [Hama] This gun has potential for build crafting. Truesight and Steadyhand is your go to Sights and you can use either Accurized or Flared for Mags depending on what you want. Demo is one of your core perks in the 3rd column and with this you can either opt into a Nade focused build with Adren Junkie or you can mess around with Osmosis if you want. Recommended MW: Range or Reload.
data.name: Judgment

data.description: [Hama] An okay Pulse Rifle. Being able to roll Adren Junkie for Nade builds or Multikill Clip / Frenzy for general damage gives it some versatility. Subsistence and Heating Up are the main perks I'd use in the 3rd column. Arrowhead / Fluted would be my recommended Barrels and High-Cal / Light Mag for Mags. Armor Piercing can be good in Match Game. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Jurassic Green

data.description: [Hama] The best roll on this gun imo. Stats For All and One For All is such a solid combo on guns that can utilize it. Arrowhead and Hammerforged are your go to barrels along with High-Cal or Light Mag for your mags. If you want more Range or Reload is down to preference. SFA and OFA is a really good combo for this gun as it basically gives you everything you want. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Krait

data.description: [Hama] This Auto Rifle can roll an interesting combination of perks. Arrowhead / Hammerforged are my go to barrels along with High-Cal / Light Mag. Stats For All would be my 1st choice in the 3rd column, but Overflow and Subsistence are also solid options. Adagio gives a solid damage buff and you basically don't feel the downsides of it, but Vorpal and One For All is also solid options. The best roll for this is Stats For All + One For All though. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Krait

data.description: [Hama] You can get some crazy ranged with this gun, but lacks in perks. SRO-41 Ocular and SRO-37 will allow you to hit for 40m+. Flared and Tac Mag is the go to Mags here and Outlaw is the only good option in your 3rd column. Your go to damage perks are Kill Clip and Rampage, which is somewhat lackluster. My preference is on Kill Clip though. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Last Perdition

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Le Monarque

data.description: [Hama] Solid Pulse for Kinetic Slot and with a pretty high zoom you can reach pretty far with this. Arrowhead / Fluted are preferred Barrels and Accurized / Flared for Mags. Heating Up is a pretty solid combination with Frenzy, but you can also opt into Feeding Frenzy and Surplus along with Adren Junkie or Rampage. My preference is HU + Frenzy though. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability.
data.name: Legal Action II

data.description: [Hama] Solid Pulse for Kinetic Slot and with a pretty high zoom you can reach pretty far with this. Arrowhead / Fluted are preferred Barrels and Accurized / Flared for Mags. Heating Up is a pretty solid combination with Frenzy, but you can also opt into Feeding Frenzy and Surplus along with Adren Junkie or Rampage. My preference is HU + Frenzy though. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability.
data.name: Legal Action II

data.description: [Hama] Personally I enjoy this Fusion a lot. How I see it is that Rapid Fusions needs a damage perk to feel good and for this one I'd go with Adagio for general use and Golden Tricorn for Void Nade builds. To go with this I'd say Perpetual Motion as my first choice and Stats For All as my 2nd. For Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and Liquid Coils / Enhanced for Batteries. Recommended MW: Stability.

data.description: [Hama] Very strong weapon against Taken enemies and can be paired with the Hunter Exotic, Lucky Pants for high damage values in general.

data.description: [Hama] This is a Energy Shotgun you'd mostly get for 1-2 Punch purposes. Full Choke is preferred, though not required. Assault Mag or Accurized Rounds are your best options, but also not important. Perpetual Motion or Pulse Monitor are the third column perks you want, but One-Two Punch is what defines this roll in the fourth column. Recommended MW: Handling or Range.

data.description: [Hama] Multimach is a menace in both PvE and PvP. Due to Model 8 Red and Model 6 Loop it has higher range than all other current 900 RPM SMG's and you can push this further by using Accurized, but Flared is also fine for your Mag. For your 3rd column is Subsistence and Threat Detector both fine, but you can also utilize Killing Wind. For dmg you'll mostly want One For All or Kill Clip. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Multimach CCX

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Multimach CCX

data.description: [Hama] My go to roll for this gun. Arrowhead is amazing on a lot of weapons and this is definitely one of them. Fluted would be my 2nd choice. Both Accurized and Flared work well on this gun, but feel free to opt into Appended or Tact Mag. Rapid Hit is an amazing perk for Scouts as it provides a lot of Reload+Stability. Explosive Payload is a nice damage increase that will also help you deal with Barrier Champions when Scout mods are available. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Night Watch

data.description: [Hama] Arrowhead is amazing on a lot of weapons and this is definitely one of them. Fluted would be my 2nd choice. Both Accurized and Flared work well on this gun, but feel free to opt into Appended or Tact Mag. Rapid Hit is an amazing perk for Scouts as it provides a lot of Reload+Stability. Demo is good for those of you who wish to spec into nade builds while Multikill Clip and Rampage works well for extra damage. Though I'd personally go with MKC. Recommended MW: Range.

data.description: [Hama] Solid Rapid Fire Fusion if you want a Reservoir Burst option.
data.name: Null Composure

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Occluded Finality

data.description: [Hama] One For All and Stats for All is so good on weapons that can reliably proc them. Arrowhead / Fluted is your go to on most Pulse Rifles. As you're already getting a chunk of stats from Stats For All I'd go with Accurized as my first choice, but having extra Reload off the bat is not a bad option either. Stats For All and One For All synergize really well and is the best roll for this Pulse in my opinion as it gives you basically everything you want in terms of stats and damage. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Ogma PR6

data.description: [Hama] The Grenadebuckler combo. Aim for Arrowhead and Fluted as your Barrels. For Mag you can either opt into more Range or Reload speed depending on your preferences, I'd personally go for Flared as my 1st choice and then Accurized as my 2nd choice. Demo and Adren Junkie has a big synergy and allows you to maintain a damage boost and reload your gun as well using your grenade ability, while getting grenade ability back by getting kills with your weapon. Recommended MW: Range or Reload.
data.name: Ogma PR6

data.description: [Hama] My go to here is Smallbore, Accurized and Short Action Stock as it gives a nice bump to Handling while also providing you 97 Range.
data.name: Osteo Striga

data.description: [Hama] Nanites is pretty good for ad clear and will also deal with major enemies pretty well. Very good Exotic Primary to use overall.
data.name: Outbreak Perfected

data.description: [Hama] Solid all around Fusion. Feeding Frenzy and Reservoir Burst is amazing for general ad control and makes this Fusion feel really good in general. Arrowhead and Fluted are preferred Barrels and you'd want Liquid Coils to increase the chances of killing something with Reservoir Burst, but Accelerated is fine too if you prefer that. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability.
data.name: PLUG ONE.1

data.description: [Hama] Honestly, I mostly consider Compulsive Reloader to be a meme roll, but paired with Reservoir Burst I guess this is the only possible use case for it right now. Even then I'd rather just have Feeding Frenzy or Heating Up. Arrowhead / Fluted and Liquid / Accelerated (Preference). Recommended MW: Handling or Stability.
data.name: PLUG ONE.1

data.description: [Hama] Solid all around Fusion. Feeding Frenzy and Reservoir Burst is amazing for general ad control and makes this Fusion feel really good in general. Arrowhead and Fluted are preferred Barrels and you'd want Liquid Coils to increase the chances of killing something with Reservoir Burst, but Accelerated is fine too if you prefer that. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability.

data.description: [Hama] Honestly, I mostly consider Compulsive Reloader to be a meme roll, but paired with Reservoir Burst I guess this is the only possible use case for it right now. Even then I'd rather just have Feeding Frenzy or Heating Up. Arrowhead / Fluted and Liquid / Accelerated (Preference). Recommended MW: Handling or Stability.

data.description: [Hama] Your go to DPS roll on this weapon. Having access to Enhanced Auto-Loading and both Explosive Light and Lasting Impression makes this Rocket a beast for DPS. Quick Launch and Linear Comp is your go to barrels and while you'd prefer Impact Casting, Black Powder is also fine. Ideally you will craft this gun though. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Palmyra-B

data.description: [Hama] For burst damage this thing hurts a lot, but it takes a while to ramp back up so it's not a reliable sustained DPS weapon. Not non boss scenario's you can nuke champions with this thing though.
data.name: Parasite

data.description: [Hama] Sold Kinetic GL for Blinding Grenades as you can roll either Auto-Loading or Perp Motion. Quick Launch is your preferred barrel, but it's not that important for Blinding. Smart Drift is your 2nd option. Auto-Loading is good if you're often swapping weapons in between, while Perp Motion will help you if you're keeping it out over time. Danger Zone will increase Blinding radius by 3m when procced, but free damage from Vorpal or extra on demand Nade from Demo is also good. Recommended MW: Velocity or Handling.
data.name: Pardon Our Dust

data.description: [Hama] Kinetic GL with solid rolls. Hard Launch is my go to barrel to get the Blast Radius lower, but Quick Launch is a good 2nd option. Ambitious is amazing on Special GL's and this is no exception, though you can also opt into Perp Motion or Auto-Loading if you prefer that. Vorpal is a good all around damage option, but Adren Junkie can be good if you're into nade builds. Demo is also an option. Recommended MW: Velocity or Handling.
data.name: Pardon Our Dust

data.description: [Hama] This Sidearm feels really good to use, but it is kind of limited to Headstone for Stasis use unless you want Demo for Nade builds or you're fine with Swash as a damage option. Perpetual Motion does pair really well with Sidearms, but Subsistence is also nice if you want that. Fluted / Corkscrew are my recommended Barrels along with Flared / Tactical for Mags. Recommended MW: Reload or Handling.
data.name: Peacebond

data.description: [Hama] I've never really liked the feel of 150 rpm Scout Rifles until this one came along and a good amount of people I've talked to seem to share this sentiment. Arrowhead Brake goes from 74 Recoil into 100, Fluted is a good 2nd option. I'd prefer Flared and Tact Mag as a 2nd choice. Rapid Hit is one of the best perks as it gives so much Reload and Stability. Explosive Payload is a generally good damage perk option on a Scout, but this can also roll Headstone if you're into that. Vorpal is also nice for Champions. Recommended MW: Handling
data.name: Perses-D

data.description: [Hama] Stats for All is pretty much your go to here. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and High-Cal / Light Mag for Mags. You can pair Stats For All with Vorpal for general use or Adrenaline Junkie if you're speccing into grenade builds. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Piece of Mind

data.description: [Hama] Overflow and Perpetual Motion are good options if you don't want Stats For All. For Barrels you'll want Arrowhead / Fluted along with High-Cal / Light Mag for Mags. Overflow gives you a huge mag which is gonna feel good on a Rapid Fire, while Perp Motion will reward you for moving around. Personally I'd say Overflow > Perp Motion. Vorpal is your go to damage option in general, but Adren Junkie is better if you're speccing into nades. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Piece of Mind

data.description: [Hama] While lacking the traditional best Scout perks, Pleiades is still serviceable with Multikill Clip for dmg & Demo for Nade builds. You'll want to pair this with Outlaw, Surplus or Subsistence in that order of preference. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and Armor Piercing is nice for Match Game content, otherwise High Cal is best for Mags. Recommended MW: Stability.
data.name: Pleiades Corrector

data.description: [Hama] A very good and easily obtainable Arc Precision Bow from the Monument in the Tower. Elastic String, Archer's Tempo and Vorpal are all solid on a Bow, it's a bit unlucky on the Arrow though so maybe one day we'll get a better replacement.
data.name: Point of the Stag

data.description: [Hama] Hammerforged / Smallbore are your preferred Barrels and you'll want Accurized as your Mag, though Flared is also fine. Rapid Hit is your best option, but Surplus is also okay. For damage perks you'll want One For All, but Redirection is also a fine choice, but is a bit more niche in how it works. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Posterity

data.description: [Hama] Very fun Sword to run around with in PvE, Tireless and Assassin's Blade allows you to just run from ad to ad mowing them down. Relentless Strikes is also fine if you're planning on hitting the same target more than once. One For All is okay, but I personally prefer Assassin's. Jagged Edge is what you want here. Recommended MW: Impact. (Guaranteed)
data.name: Quickfang

data.description: [Hama] Not made up my mind what I feel is best here yet.
data.name: Ragnhild-D

data.description: [Hama] Iron Banner Sword DPS Edition. Jagged Edge is normally your go to for Swords, Honed Edge is a fine 2nd choice. Swordmaster's Guard is your best option, but as long as you're avoiding Heavy Guard you're fine. Relentless Strikes is very good for when you're consistently hitting targets, while Tireless Blade is good for when you're just killing ads. Relentless is your DPS go to option. Frenzy is an interesting option on Swords now that Vorpal has been nerfed to be 10% on Power weapons. Recommended MW: Impact.
data.name: Razors Edge

data.description: [Hama] Iron Banner Sword with potential, AD clear edition. Jagged Edge is your go to, Honed Edge is a fine 2nd choice. Swordmaster's Guard is your best option, but as long as you're avoiding Heavy Guard you're fine. Relentless Strikes is very good for when you're consistently hitting targets, while Tireless Blade is good for when you're just killing ads. Tireless is your go to in casual content, though in casual scenario's you can also mess with Unrelenting. Frenzy has potential on Swords now that Vorpal is 10% on Power weapons. Chain Reaction also has potential in casual content. Recommended MW: Impact.
data.name: Razors Edge

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Reckless Endangerment

data.description: [Hama] As the only 720 rpm Void Auto available at the moment this weapon has some merit. Kill Clip / Swash are your only dmg options, but you have Demo for Nade builds. The only perk in the 3rd column worth using is Outlaw. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and for Mags I'd say go for High-Cal / Ricochet. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Reckless Oracle

data.description: [Hama] I don't see much use for this outside of Headstone shenanigans tbh as Machine Guns are not in a good spot overall. Arrowhead / Fluted are your go to Barrels and you'll want Accurized or Flared for your Mag. The choice between Stats For All, Perpetual Motion and Subsistence ends up being just preference tbh. I'd go with Stats For All though. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Recurrent Impact

data.description: [Hama] Really fun Rocket Launcher that can make use of Golden Tricorn. Quick Launch / Smart Drift is your preferred Barrels and you'll ideally want Alloy Mag, but Impact Casing is also fine. I would opt into Ambitious Assassin or Field Prep here as I see this more as a gun you use for non DPS scenarios. This is also why I enjoy running Golden Tricorn on it as Void makes this very easy to make use of. Frenzy and Lasting Impression are also good options though. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Red Herring

data.description: [Hama] A DPS machine. With Veist Stinger and Triple Tap you never have to reload, which makes this a super strong DPS option with Firing Line. Arrowhead Brake and Fluted are preferred along with Enhanced Mag, but you can opt into Liquid or Accelerated Coils based on preference. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Reeds Regret

data.description: [Hama] A DPS machine. Veist Stinger on this would be ideal, but Triple Tap is what makes this a super strong DPS option with Firing Line. Arrowhead Brake and Fluted are preferred along with Enhanced Mag, but you can opt into Liquid or Accelerated Coils based on preference. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Reeds Regret

Arrowhead and Fluted are preferred barrels and Enhanced Battery is nice to push up your mag size. Vorpal is your go to DMG option for solo content and Firing Line for group content. Recommended MW: Handling.

data.description: [Hama] Our first Legendary Trace Rifle and is super versatile in rolls. For general use you'd want to opt into One For All in terms of damage perks, but Golden Tricorn can be really good on a Solar subclass. Demo is for Nade builds. Perpetual Motion is my go to here, but you can also opt into Feeding Frenzy or Subsistence. For Barrels I'd recommend Fluted / Hammerforged and for Batteries I'd go for Tactical / Light. Recommended MW: Range or Handling.

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Riiswalker

data.description: [Hama] A very solid Exotic SMG for content that involves a lot of Arc damage. Most Fallen weapons and Hive melee attacks are Arc. Can be very fun to use in strikes such as Fallen Saber and Devil's Lair.
data.name: Riskrunner

data.description: [Hama] DPS roll. Auto-Loading and Lasting Impression is a solid choice for DPS scenario's, but some will feel that the delayed explosion is unreliable. This comes down to preference in this case. Linear and Quick Launch are my go to barrels and ideally you'd want Impact Casing, but Black Powder and High Velocity Rounds are also fine. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Royal Entry

data.description: [Hama] Solid Rocket Launcher. Field Prep and Clown is a spicy combination, but Lasting Impression is also solid for more damage. Linear or Quick Launch would be my go to barrels along with Alloy Casing, but Impact Casing is always solid as well. Precision Rockets have reduced Impact damage, but this is so small it's not really worth worrying about. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Royal Entry

data.description: [Hama] Amazing GL from Chosen. Special GL's with Chain Reaction is pretty rare and being paired with Ambitious Assassin makes this pretty much as good of a roll you can ask for. You also have the option of Vorpal and Demo which makes this already overloaded gun even more versatile.
data.name: Salvager's Salvo

data.description: [Hama] I prefer Arrowhead here and Fluted as my 2nd choice. Ideally you'd go for Flared, but Tac Mag or Accurized also works. Heating Up is my go to, but Surplus and Subsistence also work and is down to preference. Multikill Clip is a solid damage option, but Adren Junkie works for people who spec into nade builds. I'm not too big of a fan of Rampage, but is also usable. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Scathelocke

data.description: [Hama] Servant Leader is super versatile, but the main roll you want to go for is Rapid Hit. Surplus is your 2nd choice, but far from as good. For Nade builds you can opt into Adren Junkie, but for general dmg perks you can go for One For All, Frenzy, Multikill Clip or Kill Clip. All are good options, but I'd prefer OFA or Frenzy. For Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and for Mags I'd go for Flared / Tactical. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Servant Leader

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Servant Leader

data.description: [Hama] A fun lightweight shotgun for casual use. Full Choke, Barrel Shroud and Corkscrew are all good options here. Assault Mag and Accurized Rounds are both fine, but I prefer Assault Mag. Slideshot and Auto-Loading are both viable and will depend on your play style. Vorpal is your damage option. Recommended MW: Range.

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Seventh Seraph CQC-12

data.description: [Hama] Shadow Price has a couple solid perk options. Personally I prefer One For All, but Swash is also okay. Kill Clip is your most reliable damage option, unless you're speccing into Nade builds in which case it's Adren Junkie. Golden Tricorn is a spicy option if you're running Void subclass. Extended Mag is also an option, but is suboptimal. Recommended MW: Reload or Handling.

data.name: Sleeper Simulant

data.description: [Hama] Pretty rough to farm this one, so if you have it that's pretty lucky. Quick Launch / Smart Drift is your go to Barrels and ideally you'd want Impact Casing with Auto-Loading, but it's only a very small damage increase. You're basically just looking for Auto-Loading + Vorpal here as otherwise it's not really worth keeping around. Hothead ends up being easier to farm. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Sleepless

data.description: [Hama] A good Fusion Rifle overall. Reservoir Burst is my favorite Fusion perk and it enables synergy for easy Stats For All procs, but Surplus is also really good to have. For Barrels I'd say go for Arrowhead / Fluted and the Batteries I'd recommend are Liquid / Participle Repeater. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability.
data.name: Snorri FR5

data.description: [Hama] A good Fusion Rifle overall. If you don't want Reservoir Burst then One For All is the dmg perk to go for, but Successful Warm-Up is also an option if you want to get a lower Charge Time. Stats For All / Surplus are both good options for what you want on a Fusion. For Barrels I'd recommend going for Arrowhead / Fluted and in terms of Batteries Enhanced / Accelerated. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability.

data.name: Snorri FR5

data.description: [Hama] Frenzy / Adren Junkie is nice damage options on this Slug Shotgun, but the only good option in 3rd column is Auto-Loading. Preferred Barrels are Arrowhead / Fluted and for Mags you'd want Assault / Appended. Recommended MW: Handling or Range.
data.name: Sojourner's Tale

data.description: [Hama] Fun Sword to mess around with. Chain Reaction on a Caster frame is interesting and allows for some fun in casual content. Vorpal is also decent here. Jagged Edge is preferred, but Honed works too. Swordmaster's Guard is preferred, but as long as you're avoiding Heavy Guard you're fine. The choice between Tireless and Relentless Blade will vary, but for the most part I'd say go for Tireless. Recommended MW: Impact.
data.name: Sola's Scar

data.description: [Hama] Fun Sword to mess around with. Chain Reaction on a Caster frame is interesting and allows for some fun in casual content. Vorpal is also decent here. Jagged Edge is preferred, but Honed works too. Swordmaster's Guard is preferred, but as long as you're avoiding Heavy Guard you're fine. The choice between Tireless and Relentless Blade will vary, but for the most part I'd say go for Tireless. Recommended MW: Impact.

data.description: [Hama] Various good combinations here. For Barrels you'd want Arrowhead / Smallbore and for Mags: Accurized / Flared. Feeding Frenzy works very well with Multikill Clip, but can also work well with One For All for damage options. Surplus and Subsistence is also fine with every options here. While MKC and OFA are your main damage options you can also spec into Demo or Adren Junkie if you're running nade builds. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Sorrows Verse

data.description: [Hama] Arrowhead / Fluted is your go to Barrels here and ideally you'd get Flared / Tac Mag, but Accurized is also an option. Personally I feel Surplus is your best option in the 3rd column, but Feeding Frenzy and Outlaw are also good options. For damage you have the options of Vorpal and Kill Clip, I'm leaning towards the consistency of Vorpal imo. Demo is for Nade builds. Recommended MW: Handling or Range.
data.name: Stars In Shadow

data.description: [Hama] Sadly one of the underperformers amongst 900 RPM's. Multikill Clip and Feeding Frenzy are your only real options here. Hammerforged / Smallbore are my recommended Barrels here along with Ricochet / Light Mag for Mags. Phase Mag is a cool concept, but is in the end just detrimental to your gun. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Stochastic Variable

data.description: [Hama] A very potent SMG with spicy options such as Frenzy / Demo. For Barrels I'd recommend Hammerforged / Full Bore as your base Handling is already high. Accurized is solid, but you can also use Flared for Mag. Overflow is my preferred choice when combining it with Frenzy, but Subsistence is also a very potent option. Perpetual Motion is also fine a good choice. You can also use Demo instead of Frenzy if you wish to spec more into nades. Swashbuckler is also solid if you want that. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Submission

data.description: [Hama] A very potent SMG that can roll Enhanced Swashbuckler. Enh Swash has a +2s duration over base so that's a big increase in potency for it. This makes it a very good option imo. Hammerforged / Full Bore are your go to Barrels and either Accurized or Flared for Mag. Perpetual Motion would be my go to with Swash. Overflow and Subsistence are also good options though. If you want a more general roll you'd opt for Frenzy or Demo. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Submission

data.description: [Hama] Succession is a really solid PvE Sniper from DSC. Arrowhead Brake is your go barrel, but Fluted is also a solid choice. Here you kinda want Extended Mag so you can reach 5 in the mag when using Backup Mag, otherwise you want Tactical Mag to ensure that you have at least 4 in the mag. Reconstruction is amazing in both casual content and DPS scenarios. Vorpal is your best overall option, but Recombination is also not a bad option. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload Speed.
data.name: Succession

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Succession

data.description: [Hama] A very simple, fun to use Exotic that does exactly what you expect it to. Isn't as effective in most higher end content as you have other priorities, but everywhere else a very solid gun that you can build craft around.
data.name: Sunshot

data.description: [Hama] 180s are generally not considered to be in a great spot unfortunately. One For All / Multikill Clip are good general use dmg options, but you can also go for Adren Junkie for Nade builds. To pair with this you'd want Rapid Hit, but Outlaw is okay, Hammer / Smallbore are the Barrels I recommend and for Mags I'd say anything that gives Range and/or Reload. High Cal would be my preferred. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Survivors Epitaph

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Sweet Business

data.description: [Hama] This is basically THE roll for this gun. Arrowhead Brake / Hammerforged are your go to barrels and Accurized for your Mag, though Flared is no bad choice. Stats For All and One For all has such a big synergy together and this gun has the ability to proc both very easily with it's high rate of fire. It's basically a bunch of stats and damage for free. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Sweet Sorrow

data.description: [Hama] If you need more damage to Barriers or wish to run nade builds. Arrowhead / Hammerforged is the ideal here along with Accurized or Flared. Stats For All gives a ton of stats which is easily procced on this weapon. If you wish to take down Barrier Champions faster you'd want to go for Vorpal or if you're doing grenade builds Demo is your choice. In the end I'd rather run with One For All due to the synergy it has with Stats For All though. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Sweet Sorrow

data.description: [Hama] Perpetual Motion works on this gun, but it's not ideal. Arrowhead and Hammerforged are the barrels you want and you'd pair this with Accurized or Flared. Perpetual Motion is easy to proc and maintain, but in the end gives a lower benefit than Stats For All. One For All and Vorpal are your damage options, with One For All being very easy to proc. Demo is for nade builds. Recommended MW: Range.

data.name: Sweet Sorrow

data.description: [Hama] Pulse Rifle with a nice feel to it, but lackluster rolls. Arrowhead / Fluted are solid for Barrels. High-Cal is preferred, but Light Mag or options that give Range or Reload. Outlaw is a good choice in your 3rd column, but if you're running Frenzy you can run with Enhanced Hip-Fire Grip. Vorpal / Frenzy for damage, but you can opt into Headstone. Recommended MW: Range.

data.description: [Hama] For high end content I can't say pellet shotguns have been very desirable for a while and this gun is no exception. Though it does have some fun rolls that you can use in the majority of the game and be just fine. For PvE it's kind of hard to go wrong with barrels on a shotgun, although I'd recommended Corkscrew and Barrel Shroud for the benefit of having extra stats, though I wouldn't blame anyone for preferring Full Choke either. Aggressive Shotguns have a pretty low RPM compared to other shotguns so bumping that feel up slightly with Assault Mag is nice, though I'd also say Accurized Rounds are just as good to bump up that range slightly. Subsistence is pretty fun on a shotgun as it basically just allows you to run at the enemy and shoot until you're out of reserves if you're doing content that allows you to do so, but Ensemble is nice for group content for that Reload and Handling boost while Lead From Gold is also there if you feel you're lacking on Ammo. (Kind of want to try out Steady Hands tbh). Vorpal stands out to me as the best damage option, but Adrenaline Junkie is also a very viable option if you're one to run Grenade builds. Recommended MW: Range or Handling
data.name: The Comedian

data.description: [Hama] This Scout offers insane range. Rifle Scope SSF will allow you to hit targets at 105m+, but this is never necessary so Red Dot Micro and Red Dot 2 MOA are fine. Field Prep, Ensemble and Impulse Amplifier is my preference in that order. data.name: The Messenger

data.description: [Hama] While mostly used in PvP, Messenger has okay PvE rolls too. Arrowhead / Fluted are your go to Barrels and High-Cal or Light Mag are your best options for Mag. Pulse Rifles synergize very well with Rapid Hit, but Stats for All or Outlaw are also solid options. One For All is your best damage option as Desperado lowers your damage in PvE. Recommended MW: Range or Handling.

data.description: [Hama] You're mainly just using this for Eager Edge. Also a pretty rare drop.
data.name: The Other Half

data.description: [Hama] Personal Recommendation Hammerforged and Smallbore are both good options. High-Cal is nice for extra flinch and Armor Piercing rounds gives a dmg buff against shields. Personally I think Stats For All and One For All is the perk combo you're looking for, but Outlaw and Overflow are also nice options for 3rd column and Rampage is still good for 4th Column. Recommended MW: Range or Reload
data.name: The Palindrome

data.name: The Steady Hand

data.description: [Hama] Summoner is a decent PvE weapon, paired with Perpetual Motion I feel you can opt more into Range than with Heating Up and Overflow. Preferred Barrels: Arrowhead / Fluted and Preferred Mags: High-Cal / Armor Piercing. Multikill Clip and Rampage both work well with Perp Motion, with my preference being MKC. Golden Tricorn is a spicy option if you're running a Solar subclass. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: The Summoner

data.description: [Hama] Overflow allows some very spicy mag sizes with Summoner and while I'd rather prefer Perp Motion it's a very valid option. My preferred Barrels are Arrowhead / Hammerforged with High-Cal / Armor Piercing as Mags. Rampage is your go to damage option with Overflow due to anti synergy with MKC, but Golden Tricorn is also a solid perk if you're running a Solar subclass. Recommended MW: Reload.
data.name: The Summoner

data.description: [Hama] Summoner is a decent PvE weapon, some people prefer Heating Up over Perp Motion and Overflow. Preferred Barrels are Arrowhead / Fluted and you'd want High-Cal / Armor Piercing as Mags. Though other Range / Reload options are good too. HU works well with MKC and Rampage, with me personally leaning towards MKC. Golden Tricorn is also a solid choice if running a Solar subclass. Recommended MW: Reload.

data.description: [Hama] Good Pulse for PvE activities. Preferred Barrels: Arrowhead / Fluted and Preferred Mags: High-Cal / Armor Piercing, though you can use any that gives Range or Reload. Surplus works well on this and is what I'd pair with One For All here, but is flexible overall. Feeding Frenzy has good synergy with Multikill Clip, but can also be used with OFA or Vorpal. Subsistence also works with any of the 3. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: The Third Axiom

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Thorn

data.description: [Hama] This currently doesn't have much use tbh, but this is the first Stasis Sniper that we have. Arrowhead / Fluted are your go to options here and you'd want Appended Mag to make it so you can reach 7 bullets in the Mag with Backup Mag Mod. Overflow feels very nice on a Sniper and will allow you to avoid reloading for the most part. Firing Line is your primary damage option, but it can also roll Headstone as it's a Stasis weapon. Recommended MW: Handling
data.name: Thoughtless

data.description: [Hama] While outshined by Reeds and Cataclysmic, Threaded Needle still has use as a Void LFR. Frenzy / Vorpal are your best damage options and both Clown / Auto-Loading works well with these. My preferred Barrels are Arrowhead / Fluted and for Batteries I'd like Enhanced / Liquid. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Threaded Needle

data.description: [Hama] A very good bow for general ad clear and you can build craft around the Solar explosions. Good for casual content and high end content when Overload Bow is around as a Seasonal mod.
data.name: Ticuu's Divination

data.description: [Hama] Kill Clip and Swash are your primary dmg options for Tigerspite. You can choose to pair this with either Subsistence, Surplus or Overflow. My recommended Barrels are Arrowhead / Fluted and for Mags you can go High Cal / Light Mag. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Tigerspite

data.description: [Hama] Frenzy on Tigerspite isn't the highest damage option, but it basically maxes out Handling & Reload. You'd want to pair Frenzy with Subsistence / Overflow. Ambitious Assassin Might be fun too. Arrowhead / Fluted would be my recommended Barrels and High Cal or Light Mag for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Tigerspite

data.description: [Hama] Generally for Nade builds, Demo is an option for Tigerspite. I think there's better weapons suited for this, but if you like Tigerspite you can pair it with Subsistence, Surplus or Overflow. Arrowhead / Fluted are my preferred Barrels and High Cal / Light Mag for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Tigerspite

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Tommy's Matchbook

data.description: [Hama] Auto-Loading and Lasting Impression is solid for DPS. Quick Launch and Smart Drift are your go to barrels and you'll want Impact Casing as Mag, but Black Powder is also fine. Some people don't like how Lasting Impression can feel unreliable for bosses that go immune, but this is down to preference. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Tomorrow's Answer

data.description: [Hama] Auto-Loading and Lasting Impression is solid for DPS. Quick Launch and Smart Drift are your go to barrels and you'll want Impact Casing as Mag, but Black Powder is also fine. data.name: True Prophecy

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: True Prophecy

data.description: [Hama] 260 Scouts feel good to me in general. Arrowhead is your go to perk on Scouts in general, Fluted being a good 2nd option. You'll either want Reload or Range so I'd go for Flared, Tact Mag or Accurized in that order. Outlaw is a solid option, but Surplus is also strong. Redirection is your damage option, while Wellspring is your utility option for 4th column as there's not many flexible rolls on this weapon. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Trustee

data.description: [Hama] For Blinding Grenades additional Handling and Velocity is nice, making Quick Launch / Smart Drift Control ideal. Auto-Loading synergizes well with Blinding Grenades, Field Prep = fine, and Demo is always a good choice. Disruption Break for Match Game content. Recommended MW: Velocity or Handling.
data.name: Truthteller

data.description: [Hama] w/ Spike Grenades you want the lowest Blast Radius possible as it negatively affects your damage, making Hard launch your best option, Quick Launch is my 2nd pick here. Feeding Frenzy and Multikill Clip are a nice synergy allowing you to chain kills easier. Demolitionist is nice for grenade builds. Recommended MW: Velocity
data.name: Truthteller

data.description: [Hama] With Spike Grenades you want to have as low Blast Radius as possible as it negatively affects your damage. Hard Launch is therefore your best option, but the other Barrels that doesn't increase your Blast Radius are also fine. Quick Launch is my 2nd pick here. Auto-Loading is nice to have, but doesn't really synergize well with any other perk than Demo and maybe Disruption Break here, but I see DB as more of a Blinding options than when you're using Spike. Recommended MW: Velocity.
data.name: Truthteller

data.description: [Hama] Heavy GL's aren't in a really good spot, but Typhon is the only non sunset one who can currently roll Explosive Light. It can also roll Adren Junkie for Nade builds. You'll want Hard / Quick Launch and Spike Grenades. Demolitionist is your best perk in 3rd column. Recommended MW: Handling / Reload.
data.name: Typhon Gl5

data.description: [Hama] Getting this weapon to drop is harder than getting a good roll as it's only a 3/3. Though if you do happen to get one then Elastic String is what you want, but Polymer is a fine 2nd choice. Straight Fletching is the best, however Helical is an okay substitute. Archer's Tempo and Explosive Head is generally what you want, but some people might like Dragonfly. Recommended MW: Draw Time.
data.name: Tyranny of Heaven

data.description: [Hama] Best legendary Void bow as of Risen, 4th column can roll some interesting stuff like Dragonfly & Successful Warm-up if you wish to relive the Hush days, but I prefer to stick to Archer's Tempo + Explosive Head. Elastic String is preferred, but Polymer is also good. Fiberglass is what you want in your Arrow slot, with Straight Fletching being 2nd best. Recommended MW: Draw Time.
data.name: Under Your Skin

data.description: [Hama] If you want to get the feel of Hush back this is the roll for you as it gets the Draw Time down to 270ms with Elastic String and Draw Time MW. Recommended MW: Draw Time.
data.name: Under Your Skin

data.description: [Hama] Recommended MW: Draw Time.
data.name: Under Your Skin

data.description: [Hama] Triple Tap along with Vorpal is the DPS way to go on this weapon, but the non adept version requires Appended or Extended along with Backup Mag to reach 7 in the Mag. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels. Recommended MW: Reload or Handling.
data.name: Uzume RR4

data.description: [Hama] For casual use you'd want Clown along with Vorpal as you can't reliably proc Triple Tap. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and Appended / Flared for Mags. Recommended MW: Reload.
data.name: Uzume RR4

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Uzume RR4

data.description: [Hama] Adept Uzume only requires Tactical Mag to hit 7 in the Mag when using Adept Mag mod, which is ideal for the Triple Tap + Vorpal combination. This makes it better than the non adept version in this specific case. I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted for Barrels. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload.
data.name: Uzume RR4 (Adept)
