data.name: Vex Mythoclast

data.description: [Hama] Not that many options for this one sadly. Arrowhead / Fluted are your go to choices and you can opt for either High Cal / Armor Piercing or Light Mag. For 3rd column there's only Surplus and Wellspring worth considering. Firefly is a fun perk and is better than the alternative which is Frenzy or Kill Clip. Recommended MW: Stability or Handling.
data.name: Vision of Confluence

data.description: [Hama] Not that many options for this one sadly. Arrowhead / Fluted are your go to choices for Barrels and you can opt for either High Cal / Armor Piercing or Light Mag. For 3rd column there's only Surplus and Wellspring worth considering. Firefly is a fun perk and is better than the alternative which is Frenzy or Kill Clip. Recommended MW: Stability or Handling.
data.name: Vision of Confluence (Timelost)

data.description: [Hama] Solid roll for gun as Explosive Payload procs on anything with no requirements. Arrowhead and Fluted is your go to Barrels and you'd ideally pair this with a Mag that increases mag size such as Tac or Appended Mag, but Flared works too. Rapid Hit works super well on Scouts as it gives you a lot of value in both Stability and Reload. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability.
data.name: Vouchsafe

data.description: [Hama] This roll pairs well against Barrier champs as Vorpal will help you burst their shield faster. Arrowhead and Fluted are my preferred Barrels and due to Rapid Hit increasing Reload and Stability by so much I'd prefer to have Mags that increase mag size such as Appended or Tact Mag. Multikill Clip is also a viable option. Recommended MW: Stability or Handling.
data.name: Vouchsafe

data.description: [Hama] You wanted Rapid Hit, but got Surplus instead. Arrowhead is your go to here, but Fluted isn't bad either. Both Flared and Tac Mag are good options. Ideally you'd want Rapid Hit instead, but Surplus is a serviceable 2nd option. Choosing between Vorpal and Explosive Payload is pretty hard, but EP is generally more reliable. Multikill Clip is also an option. Recommended MW: Stability or Handling.
data.name: Vouchsafe

data.description: [Hama] Primarily used for Headstone, but Eyasluna does that job better tbh. Fluted / Hammerforged are my recommended Barrels and Accurized / Flared for Mags. Outlaw and Headstone for 3rd and 4th column. Recommended MW: Range or Handling.
data.name: Vulpecula

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Waking Vigil

data.description: [Hama] This is a Kinetic Shotgun you'd mostly get for 1-2 Punch purposes. Full Choke is preferred, though not required. Assault Mag or Accurized Rounds are your best options, but also not important. Perpetual Motion or Slideshot are the third column perks you want, but One-Two Punch is what defines this roll in the fourth column. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Wastelander M5

data.description: [Hama Approved]
data.name: Wastelander M5

data.description: [Hama] Primarily used for DPS and is very good at it. Mostly not used due to the zoom values and other weapons being preferred atm, though this may change in the future.
data.name: Whisper of the Worm

data.description: [Hama] A lot of people (including me), are not fans of the Lightweight Bow archetype, but at least this one can roll Vorpal so there's that. Elastic String is your go to, but Polymer is a good 2nd choice. Fiberglass is your go to Arrow, but Straight Fletching is also a good choice. Archer's Tempo and Vorpal is primarily what you want here. Recommended MW: Draw Time.
data.name: Whispering Slab

data.description: [Hama] Amazing weapon for Ad clear and zone control. For both high end and casual content this is a very potent tool to use. It's less suited for scenario's where Ads are more spread out though and shines in scenarios where they're grouped together or have predictable spawns.
data.name: Witherhoard

data.description: [Hama] Interesting Bow with Adagio as best dmg option. You can also opt into something like Dragonfly if you want or Demo for Nade builds. Archer's Tempo is the main go to in the 3rd column. Elastic String is your best String, but Polymer is also fine. Fiberglass / Straight Fletching for Arrows. Shoot to Loot is a nice perk that can work well if you're good at utilizing it. Recommended MW: Draw Time.
data.name: Wolftone Draw

data.description: [Hama] Very fun Sword that can roll Cold Steel. Though very niche in most content you can totally mess around with Stasis builds around this. You'd want to pair Cold Steel with Relentless Strikes ideally and Swordmaster's Guard, though Guard doesn't really matter as long as you avoid Heavy. Jagged Edge is best, but Honed / Tempered are your 2nd/3rd options here. Recommended MW: Impact. (Guaranteed)
data.name: Zephyr
